loading.title: AliasVault 正在启动中
loading.message: 正在初始化安全环境。为最大限度保护您的隐私，AliasVault只会在您的浏览器中运行。首次加载可能需要稍等片刻。
loading.refreshText: 如果加载卡住了，可以点击下方按钮刷新页面。

errors.unhandledError: 遇到一个错误。请尝试刷新页面。如果问题仍然存在，请联系技术支持。
errors.webAssemblyError: AliasVault requires WebAssembly, which this browser does not support. Try using a more modern browser that supports WebAssembly.

security: Your identity is your most valuable asset. Protect it like one.
In the digital world, a strong password is your first line of defense.
Security is not a product, but a process.
The weakest link in the security chain is the human element.
Security is always excessive until it's not enough.
Your data is only as secure as your weakest password.
The most secure password is the one you can't remember.
